product_name: Brooks Pacer II Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Ready to go the distance on every run, the women's Brooks Pacer II Shorts offer complete coverage and comfortable, casual fit thanks to a 5 in. inseam and relaxed cut. Recycled polyester and spandex fabric blend wicks moisture and dries quickly for continual comfort; outer shorts move with you and allow full range of motion. Inner polyester liner brief also wicks moisture and dries quickly so you stay comfortable no matter how many miles you run. Elastic waistband with inner drawcord ensures snug, secure fit. The women's Brooks Pacer II Shorts have a center rear zip pocket that holds ID, energy gels, small media player or other essentials. Closeout.
short_description: Ready to go the distance on every run, the women's Brooks Pacer II Shorts offer complete coverage and comfortable, casual fit thanks to a 5 in. inseam and relaxed cut.
